original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1081)@</color>在 <color=#ccffcc>30</color> 秒召喚一群排列成八卦圖的<color=#4cc769>人俑</color>吸引敵方攻擊。<color=#4cc769>人俑</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1331)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>智力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Int(1331)@</color>人俑消失時發動特殊攻擊以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1396)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color> 對自身範圍內敵方造成法術傷害
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1081)@</color> in <color=#ccffcc>30</color> seconds to summon a group of people arranged in a gossip map The <color=#4cc769>human figurines</color> attract enemy attacks. <color=#4cc769>Human figurines</color>Attribute <color=#FFE787>Physical strength: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1331)@</color> <color=#FFE787>Int: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Int(1331)@</color> launch a special attack when the figure disappears to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1396)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color> Inflict spell damage on enemies within your own range
